Detailed Description

Placeholder class for objects that can be drawn on the screen.

This class uses the Template pattern to render objects.

virtual void Renderable::render ( SceneNode *const   node,
const hgeVector &  screenPosition,
Camera *const   cam 
) [pure virtual]

Core render method.

The other render methods call this method once it has been determined that the object should be rendered. This is the Template method.

Parameters:
node The node whose position, rotation, and scale are going to be used to render the object.
screenPosition The position to render the object at transformed into screen space.

Implemented in CompoundRenderable, LineRenderable, SimpleRenderable, TextRenderable, and TriangleRenderable.

void Renderable::render ( RenderTexture *const   tex  )  [virtual]

Overriden render method.

Parameters:
tex This is only used if the SimpleRenderable is listening to a RenderTexture.

Implements RenderableListener.
